title: Fix footer settings error and admin panel mobile issues

requirements.text: Fix the error that occurs when opening footer settings in the admin panel

quotes: Opening footer settings in admin panel is causing error. Fix it

acceptanceCriteria: Footer settings tab in admin panel opens without errors
All footer management functionality is accessible
Console shows no errors when accessing footer settings

requirements.text: Make footer section headings consistent with the rest of the UI styling and typography

quotes: Footer section headings should be consistent witj rest of the UI

acceptanceCriteria: Footer section headings use the same font family, weight, and sizing as other UI headings
Footer section heading colors match the theme color scheme
Spacing and margins around footer headings are consistent with other sections

requirements.text: Fix the admin panel settings menu layout in mobile mode to prevent crowding and overlapping of section options

quotes: Menu of the admin panel which lets us choise different setting sections is getting crowded and overlapped in the mobile mode. Fix it

acceptanceCriteria: All admin panel tabs are fully visible and accessible on mobile screens
Tab labels do not overlap or get cut off
Navigation between settings sections works smoothly on mobile devices
Layout adapts properly to different mobile screen sizes

constraints: Do not modify the existing footer data structure in the backend
Preserve all existing footer management features including drag-and-drop reordering
nonGoals: Redesigning the entire admin panel layout
Changing the desktop admin panel appearance
